wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Horne (1774 – 13 July 1860) was a British barrister and Liberal politician.

response: * William Horne (composer), DMA, (né William Phinazee Horne; born 1952), American classical composer and Professor of Music Loyola University New Orleans
* William Horne (tenor) (1913–1983), operatic tenor, notably with the New York City Opera
* William Horne (British politician) (1774–1860) British member of parliament and Attorney General for England and Wales
* William Horne (American politician) (b. 1962), Nevada state representative
* Brother William Horne (d. 1540), one of the "Carthusian Martyrs"
